channel.title: Error "disk does not exist" while launching VM (gateway and workstation)
channel.description:
Hello !
I just discovered whonix, and I wanted to install whonix on Windows 10 machine with VirtualBox(5.0.14). I have downloaded both vm, imported then in VB (seemed to be successful). Then I launched them, but I had this error, after the system had run some scripts, for both :
Alert ! /dev/disk/by-uuid/.... does not exist. Dropping to a shell. ........ ........ (initramfs)
Is someone have an idea of the problem ?
Thanks a lot !!

item.title: Error "disk does not exist" while launching VM (gateway and workstation)
item.dc:creator: Jowe
item.description:
Ok,

now it works. Seems to be because I hadn’t reboot my computer after installing VirtualBox.

Thanks for your help !

Read full topic
item.source: Error "disk does not exist" while launching VM (gateway and workstation)

item.description:
Tks Ego for your help.

I have verified both files, and I have a “good signature”

item.description:

Is there any other way to verify the images ?

tks !

item.title: Error "disk does not exist" while launching VM (gateway and workstation)
item.dc:creator: Jowe
item.description:
Hello !

I just discovered whonix, and I wanted to install whonix on Windows 10 machine with VirtualBox(5.0.14).
I have downloaded both vm, imported then in VB (seemed to be successful).
Then I launched them, but I had this error, after the system had run some scripts, for both :

Alert ! /dev/disk/by-uuid/… does not exist. Dropping to a shell.
…
…
(initramfs)

Is someone have an idea of the problem ?

Thanks a lot !!
